snippet.title: OVERRIDE: MECH CITY BRAWL - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Override: Mech City Brawl is NOW AVAILABLE on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC! Get it: https://overridegame.com/

MECH IT RAIN with a diverse roster of epic mechs, each with their own play style, special moves, and finishers. Tower over your opponents and lay waste to entire cities underfoot in local and online versus, co-op, and more. 

Customize your mechs in the Garage, changing their accessories and skins to create your own unique style. Challenge other players in local and online versus & co-op modes and experience Override’s story in a single-player campaign.

Override: Mech City Brawl is now available on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC (Steam).
$29.99 - Standard Edition 
$39.99 - Super Charged Mega Edition

Buy now: https://overridegame.com/
Get it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/709440/Override_Mech_City_Brawl/
Like on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/OverrideMCB
Follow on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/OverrideMCB
Join our Discord: http://discord.gg/6p9T7hg
